casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Juan Foronte MCPHAUL No. 421PA17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 9, 2018 Ms. Amanda S. Zimmer, Assistant Appellate Defender, Mr. Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender, Mr. William P. Hart, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, Sara B. Warf, Clinical Assistant Professor of Law, Ms. Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for NC State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th of December 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of May 2018."

Therefore the case is docketed as of the date of this order's certification. Briefs of the respective parties shall be submitted to this Court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 15(g)(2).
